attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: My phone glitched badly and was stuck on the same page I had to turn my phon off then turn it back on just because of this app do not download unless you wanna got through this like me also it takes up a lot of storage till the point where you have to clean EVERYTHING do not download this is a bad app for your phone

attributes.title: I do not recommend this app (go download tiktok instead)
attributes.review: Now I downloaded this app because I saw it on this amazing app called “TikTok”. I open the app and the first thing I see is it’s asking me for my phone number? I do not understand why the president would need my phone number??.. oh wait i am underage and of course he would want my number because he’s a 𝒫𝓇𝑒𝒹𝒶𝓉𝑜𝓇. 😌

attributes.title: absolutely horrible
attributes.review: within seconds of me downloading this app, i felt a horrible sensation in my rectum. that’s right, explosive diarrhea. at the exact moment when i was about to erupt, my child fell from out his window! and we live on the 7th floor so there was no way he could’ve survived the fall. fortunately, he was saved by a pride flag hanging from someone’s balcony, but now my 2 year old baby boy is a raging homosexual!!! 🤬🤬🤬 on top of that i could not hold my bile any longer and my entire apartment is covered with the foul mess!  i can accredit this slew of awful karma to this godforsaken app! ❌❌ this horrible app is the reason i am going to vote for biden.

attributes.title: 😡DISGUSTING😡
attributes.review: My daughter 👧🏼and I 👩🏼 👩‍👧were excited 😆 to download this app but it appears to have been hacked😱😈. When we first opened the app Trump’s dick pic 🍆was on the screen. It was terrifying🧟‍♂️. It was microscopic 🤏🏼. It looked like the end of a croissant🙅🏼‍♀️. I’m sorry my daughter👧🏼 had to see it but it was a good teaching moment 📚📝. She now knows to never settle for anything under 5 inches📏. Mommy job complete 😌💗💅🏼

attributes.title: Think about the kids
attributes.review: It’s not that I don’t like trump or trump supporters. I just don’t approve of their lifestyle. And seeing all this trump stuff here really feels like he’s pushing it onto the children. I have trump supporter friends but again they just need to fix their lifestyle. Kids are too young to be seeing this kind of stuff in the world and it’s bound to influence them and corrupt their childhoods.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: after i got this app it made my screen have green lines then the screen turned completely black and when it came back on there was a horrifying picture of an orange thing and it won’t go away. every time i try to delete the app it burns me and it keeps blocking my friends and deleting my pictures and all of my apps

attributes.title: Extremely Disappointing
attributes.review: I recently discovered that trump had this app, so naturally I was excited to get my hands on it to support my hero! To my surprise though, after opening this app, both of my lungs collapsed from the shock of how disgusting the president really is and was rushed the ER. Thankfully, I survived but I genuinely wouldn’t recommend this for anyone! I’m afraid they will be putting their safety in danger.

attributes.title: WHY IS 0 STARS NOT AN OPTION!!!??
attributes.review: Okay so I downloaded and opened this app, and I immediately was overwhelmed with this headache. And then I began to smell sweat and Cheeto puff in the air. I deleted the app, burned my phone, threw it out the window, ran it over with an electric car, and still did not get rid of the scent. It’s left a really bad taste now. Ugh. Now I gotta burn the whole house down. Don’t recommend the app or the Trump. 🤢

attributes.title: AMAZINGLY TERRIBLE
attributes.review: i is a really nice app to be there for me a bit and it has been really good fun to watch the game play and play it for me and i was a great game it was just the best way to go buy the game it is fun to get it and i was a great game but it’s a great app for the game and it’s a really nice app but it’s a great app for that game it’s fun and it really is a good way of doing what it looks really nice to do. Thank you for reading my review.

attributes.title: The worst day of my life.
attributes.review: I opened this app to hopefully better understand our outrageously orange Oompa Loompa President but instead I was harassed😞Trump🧚‍♂️notified me that he was gonna find me and steal my beautiful black skin because when he tries to tan, he comes out as burnt cheese😭This app has filled me with terror when all I wanted was to find hope in our President🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️stay safe out there fellow Americans🙏
